attributes.action: Max Keiser to be called to give evidence in any Banking Inquiry
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call for Max Keiser of the 'Keiser Report', on RT (Russian Television), MaxKeiser.com be allowed to give evidence to the Inquiry on the Fruadulent nature not just of the Libor,Eibor rate fixing but other practices in the Financial Industry.

Including but not limited to: High Frequency Trading, the Unregulated or 'Dark Banking System', Silver Market Manipulation etc
